From: 
" 
aMIE> 
To: "Hud ens, Johanna Rae" <=IMI>, "Bloom, Suzanne Jaffe" 
Cc: ' " , "Calvar, Cristina I." 
Subject: RE: Following up 
Date: Wed, 04 Dec 2019 18:58:08 +0000 
Attachments: 19_Civ._10788.pdf 
Suzanne and Johanna, 
In addition to the topic we discussed this morning, we wanted to let you know that we would appreciate the 
opportunity to discuss with your client the allegations set forth on page 7 of the attached complaint, as a follow 
up to 
some of the topics from our last meeting. 
We're of 
course happy to discuss with you at your office before we start this afternoon. 
Thanks, 
 Original Message 
From: Hudgens, Johanna Rae <a 
Sent: Wednesda December I, 2019 12:32 PM 
To:
Cc: Bloom, Suzanne Jaffe 
; Calvar, Cristina I. 
Subject: RE: Following up 
Thanks, 
We'll see you 
then. 
Best, 
Johanna 
Johanna Rae Hudgens 
Associate Attorney 
Winston & Strawn LLP 
D: 
http://www.winston.com

Assistant United States Attorney

On Dec 3, 
2019, at 1:35 PM, 
Hi Suzanne, 
Do you have a few minutes for a quick call in advance of our meeting tomorrow? Nothing urgent, but we wanted 
to check in with you about the scope of topics for tomorrow's meeting. 
Between , and me, some combination of our team should be available most times between now 
and our meeting tomorrow (with the exception of 3 p.m. to 5 p.m. today), if there's a time that works best for you 
today or tomorrow morning. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States 
Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York. NY 10007

Hope 
everyone has a good Thanksgiving. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney
